name: Flight Center Travel Group
description: Flight Center Travel Group (FLCC) is a leading global travel retailer and wholesaler with a strong presence in the leisure and corporate travel sectors. Founded in 1982 in Australia, the company has grown to become one of the largest travel agencies in the Southern Hemisphere, providing a wide range of travel services including flights, accommodation, car rentals, and travel insurance. FLCC operates under multiple brands, including Flight Centre, Student Flights, and Corporate Traveller, catering to various customer segments from budget travelers to corporate clients. The company leverages its extensive network and long-standing industry relationships to deliver competitive pricing and exceptional service. In addition to its core travel services, FLCC is also focused on enhancing the customer experience through technological innovations, integrating online booking platforms with personalized service. The company’s commitment to sustainability is evident in its initiatives to promote responsible travel and reduce its environmental footprint. With a dedicated workforce and a customer-centric approach, Flight Center Travel Group is poised to navigate the complexities of the evolving travel landscape and meet the diverse needs of travelers worldwide.

seo.meta_title: Flight Center Travel Group | Global Travel Retailer
seo.meta_description: Explore Flight Center Travel Group, a leader in global travel retail and wholesaling, offering comprehensive travel solutions for individuals and businesses.

faq.question: What services does Flight Center offer?
faq.answer: Flight Center offers a wide range of travel services including flight bookings, holiday packages, accommodation, and corporate travel management.

faq.question: Where is Flight Center headquartered?
faq.answer: Flight Center is headquartered in Brisbane, Queensland, Australia.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Flight Center?
faq.answer: Graham Turner is the CEO of Flight Center Travel Group.
